data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Throw-in for Schalke at VELTINS-Arena.
In the minute 2, Can Schalke get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Wolfsburg's half?
Free kick for Schalke in the half of Wolfsburg.
Free kick Wolfsburg.
In the minute 3, Wolfsburg drive upfield and Xaver Schlager gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Schalke defender.
Wolfsburg have been awarded a corner by Marco Fritz.
Goal! Wolfsburg have taken a 0-1 lead courtesy of a header from Wout Weghorst.
In the minute 3, Great play from Maximilian Arnold to set up the goal.
Wolfsburg awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ball safe as Schalke is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 7, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Wout Weghorst for Wolfsburg gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Schalke have a goal kick.
In the minute 8, Throw-in for Schalke in the half of Wolfsburg.
Marco Fritz awards the home team a throw-in.
In Gelsenkirchen a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 10, Schalke advance rapidly upfield but Marco Fritz blows for offside.
Wolfsburg's Josip Brekalo gets in a shot on goal at VELTINS-Arena. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Marco Fritz signals a free kick to Schalke in their own half.
In the minute 14, Ridle Baku for Wolfsburg drives towards goal at VELTINS-Arena. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Wolfsburg.
Wolfsburg push forward at VELTINS-Arena and Maxence Lacroix gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the Schalke defence.
In the minute 16, Throw-in for Wolfsburg in their own half.
Josip Brekalo (Wolfsburg) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Wolfsburg.
In the minute 18, It's a goal kick for the home team in Gelsenkirchen.
Renato Steffen (Wolfsburg) gets in a header on goal but the attempt is cleared.
Wolfsburg's Maximilian Arnold gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 20, Goal kick for Schalke at VELTINS-Arena.
Throw-in high up the field for Schalke in Gelsenkirchen.
Schalke have been awarded a corner by Marco Fritz.
In the minute 22, Schalke push upfield and Malick Thiaw gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Wolfsburg defence.
Goal! Wolfsburg extend their lead to 0-2 through Xaver Schlager.
That's a fine assist from Wout Weghorst.
In the minute 26, Corner awarded to Schalke.
Wolfsburg to take a throw-in in Schalke territory.
Throw-in Schalke.
In the minute 28, Ball goes out of play for a Wolfsburg goal kick.
Wolfsburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Schalke at VELTINS-Arena.
In the minute 31, Free kick for Schalke in their own half.
Free kick for Wolfsburg in their own half.
The match at VELTINS-Arena has been interrupted briefly for a check on Josip Brekalo, who is down injured.
In the minute 34, Josip Brekalo is back on the pitch.
Ball safe as Wolfsburg is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Marco Fritz signals a free kick to Wolfsburg.
In the minute 35, Wolfsburg's Maximilian Arnold breaks free at VELTINS-Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Marco Fritz awards Schalke a goal kick.
Marco Fritz signals a Schalke throw-in in Wolfsburg's half.
In the minute 36, Wolfsburg push upfield but Marco Fritz quickly pulls them for offside.
At VELTINS-Arena, Schalke are penalized for being offside.
Wolfsburg to take a throw-in in Schalke territory.
Renato Steffen (Wolfsburg) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Ball goes out of play for a Schalke goal kick.
In the minute 39, The home team replace Amine Harit with Benito Raman.
In the minute 40, Free kick Schalke.
Schalke pushes forward through Goncalo Paciencia, whose finish on goal is saved.
Wolfsburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 42, Schalke awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Schalke in the half of Wolfsburg.
Throw-in Wolfsburg.
In the minute 43, Can Wolfsburg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Schalke's half?
Marco Fritz signals a throw-in for Wolfsburg, close to Schalke's area.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 44, Marco Fritz signals a Wolfsburg throw-in in Schalke's half.
Throw-in for Schalke in their own half.
Benito Raman for Schalke drives towards goal at VELTINS-Arena. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 45, Schalke have been awarded a corner by Marco Fritz.
The first-half has come to a close in Gelsenkirchen.
Marco Fritz has blown to start the second-half.
Goncalo Paciencia's header is off-target for Schalke.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Gelsenkirchen.
In the minute 46, The home team have replaced Benjamin Stambouli with Steven Skrzybski. This is the second substitution made today by Manuel Baum.
In the minute 47, Corner awarded to Schalke.
In Gelsenkirchen Wolfsburg attack through Jerome Roussillon. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Schalke at VELTINS-Arena.
In the minute 49, Wolfsburg have been awarded a corner by Marco Fritz.
Wolfsburg's Maxence Lacroix is on target but unsuccessful.
In Gelsenkirchen a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 52, Wolfsburg's Renato Steffen misses with an attempt on goal.
Marco Fritz awards Schalke a goal kick.
Throw-in for Schalke in the half of Wolfsburg.
In the minute 53, Marco Fritz awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Wolfsburg at VELTINS-Arena.
Schalke have been awarded a corner by Marco Fritz.
In the minute 55, Schalke needs to be cautious. Wolfsburg have an attacking throw-in.
Wolfsburg have a dangerous throw-in.
Schalke advance rapidly upfield but Marco Fritz blows for offside.
In the minute 57, Marco Fritz signals a free kick to Wolfsburg in their own half.
Free kick for Wolfsburg in the half of Schalke.
Wolfsburg to take a throw-in in Schalke territory.
In the minute 59, Throw-in for Schalke in their own half.
Can Schalke get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Wolfsburg's half?
Corner awarded to Schalke.
In the minute 61, Can Schalke capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Wolfsburg's half?
Throw-in for Schalke close to the penalty box.
Wolfsburg awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 62, Wolfsburg have a goal kick.
Marco Fritz signals a free kick to Wolfsburg.
Wolfsburg drives forward and Wout Weghorst gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 64, Free kick for Schalke in their own half.
Schalke pushes forward through Omar Mascarell, whose finish on goal is saved.
Schalke's Goncalo Paciencia gets in a shot on goal at VELTINS-Arena. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 67, Marco Fritz awards Wolfsburg a goal kick.
Free kick for Wolfsburg in the half of Schalke.
Wolfsburg are pushing forward but Josip Brekalo's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 68, It's a goal kick for the home team in Gelsenkirchen.
Marco Fritz awards the away team a throw-in.
Marco Fritz signals a free kick to Schalke in their own half.
In the minute 71, Schalke awarded a free kick in their own half.
Wolfsburg have a goal kick.
Oliver Glasner (Wolfsburg) is making a first substitution, with Joao Victor replacing Renato Steffen.
In the minute 75, Schalke drives forward and Goncalo Paciencia gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Free kick for Schalke in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 77, Manuel Baum is making the team's third substitution at VELTINS-Arena with Nabil Bentaleb replacing Suat Serdar.
Throw-in Schalke.
In the minute 80, Marco Fritz signals a Schalke throw-in in Wolfsburg's half.
Schalke push upfield but Marco Fritz quickly pulls them for offside.
Ahmed Kutucu is on a sub for Goncalo Paciencia for Schalke.
Felix Klaus is replacing Josip Brekalo for Wolfsburg at VELTINS-Arena.
In the minute 82, Ball safe as Schalke is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Schalke are coming forward and Benito Raman gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Wolfsburg at VELTINS-Arena.
In the minute 84, Throw-in for Schalke at VELTINS-Arena.
Ball safe as Wolfsburg is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Schalke are caught offside.
Marco Fritz signals a free kick to Schalke just outside Wolfsburg's area.
In the minute 86, Xaver Schlager (Wolfsburg) has received a yellow card from Marco Fritz.
Steven Skrzybski (Schalke) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 89, Schalke awarded a free kick in their own half.
The away team have replaced Wout Weghorst with Bartosz Bialek. This is the third substitution made today by Oliver Glasner.
Oliver Glasner is making the team's fourth substitution at VELTINS-Arena with Maximilian Philipp replacing Admir Mehmedi.
Throw-in high up the field for Schalke in Gelsenkirchen.
Benito Raman of Schalke smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Marco Fritz will wait an extra 3 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Ball goes out of play for a Wolfsburg goal kick.
Marco Fritz blows to end the match. The final score is 0-2.
